title: Global electricity consumption 1980 to 2016
yAxis: Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours
summary: This statistic shows the consumption of ice cream per capita in canada from 2004 to 2016 . ice cream consumption in canada amounted to approximately 4.44 liters per capita in 2016 , down from 4.52 liters the previous year . ice cream in canada - additional information ice cream , most often classed as a dairy product , comes in a variety of different flavors and is usually made from cream or milk , with added natural or artificial flavorings , sweeteners and colorings .
gold: This statistic represents worldwide electricity consumption between 1980 and 2016 . In 2016 , the world 's electricity consumption amounted to approximately 21.8 trillion kilowatt hours . One quadrillion watts is approximately equal to one petawatt .
